resources.string: Pick your operator in the list below
Your account name at the operator:
Message source (not supported by all operators):

Welcome to True sender, a simple application to send text messages through IP based operator. Please note that the author is in no way affilliated with any of the operators. Next, you\'ll be taken to the setup screen.

Unfortunately, there was an error while sending the message and it was not delivered.

Operator specific message:
Destination number should start with international prefix 00 or +.
Message is empty, please type something before sending.
